definition[0]: an accident in which two or more people or vehicles hit each other while moving in different directions
example[0]: Two people were killed in a head-on collision  (=between two vehicles that are moving directly towards each other) on highway 218.
example[1]: The school bus was involved in a collision with a truck.
definition[1]: a strong disagreement between two people or groups
example[2]: a collision between the two countries over fishing rights
definition[2]: when a vehicle hits another vehicle or object, causing damage
example[3]: His car was in collision with another vehicle.
example[4]: All aircraft are now fitted with collision-avoidance equipment.
definition[3]: if two groups are on a collision course, they are very likely to have a serious disagreement at some time in the future
example[5]: This latest announcement may put the nationâ€™s largest cable operators on a collision course with telephone companies.
